trans-unit.source: Helps to secure another implementation of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> by wrapping the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> object and restricting the resources that the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> has access to.
trans-unit.target: Bidrar til å sikre en annen implementering av <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> ved å bryte den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> objekt og begrensning ressursene som den underliggende <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> har tilgang til.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> class is the default resolver for all classes in the <xref:System.Xml> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>klassen er Standardløsningsprogrammet for alle klasser i den <xref:System.Xml>navneområde.</xref:System.Xml> </xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>

trans-unit.source: It is used to load XML documents and to resolve external resources such as entities, DTDs or schemas, and import or include directives.
trans-unit.target: Det brukes ikke laste inn XML-dokumenter og for å løse eksterne ressurser som enheter, DTDer eller XML-skjemaer, og Importer eller inkluderingsdirektiv.

trans-unit.source: You can override this default by specifying the <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> object to use.
trans-unit.target: Du kan overstyre denne standard ved å angi den <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>objekt som skal brukes.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to restrict the resources that the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> can access, you can use an XmlSecureResolver object.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis du vil begrense ressursene som den underliggende <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>kan få tilgang til, kan du bruke et XmlSecureResolver-objekt.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: XmlSecureResolver wraps around a concrete implementation of <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> and restricts the resources that the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> has access to.
trans-unit.target: XmlSecureResolver brytes en konkret implementering av <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>og begrenser ressursene som den underliggende <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>har tilgang til.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: For example, XmlSecureResolver has the ability to prohibit cross-domain redirection, which occurs from an embedded Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) reference.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel har XmlSecureResolver mulighet til å forby tvers av domener omadressering, som forekommer fra en innebygd Uniform URI (Resource Identifier)-referanse.

trans-unit.source: When you construct an XmlSecureResolver object, you provide a valid <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> implementation along with a URL, an instance of an evidence object, or a permission set, which is used by the XmlSecureResolver to determine security.
trans-unit.target: Når du konstruere et XmlSecureResolver-objekt, gir du en gyldig <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>implementering sammen med en URL-adresse, en forekomst av et bevis-objekt eller et tillatelsessett, som brukes av XmlSecureResolver til å fastsette sikkerhet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: Either a <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet?displayProperty=fullName> is generated or the existing one is used and <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called on it to help secure the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.
trans-unit.target: Enten en <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet?displayProperty=fullName>genereres eller det finnes en brukes og <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>kalles for å sikre, og den underliggende <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > XmlSecureResolver objects can contain sensitive information such as user credentials.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > XmlSecureResolver objekter kan inneholde sensitiv informasjon, for eksempel brukerlegitimasjonen.

trans-unit.source: You should be careful when caching XmlSecureResolver objects and should not pass the XmlSecureResolver object to an untrusted component.
trans-unit.target: Du bør være forsiktig når hurtigbufring XmlSecureResolver objekter og kan ikke sende XmlSecureResolver-objekt til et uklarert komponenten.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > There are differences in the security infrastructure for code running on the .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) and for code running on the CLR that is integrated within Microsoft SQL Server 2005.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Forskjeller i sikkerhetsinfrastruktur for kode som kjører på .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) og koden som kjører på CLR er integrert i Microsoft SQL Server 2005.

trans-unit.source: This can lead to cases where code developed for the .NET Framework CLR operates differently when used on the SQL Server integrated CLR.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan føre til tilfeller der kode som er utviklet for .NET Framework CLR har forskjellige virkemåter når den brukes på SQL Server integrert CLR.

trans-unit.source: One of these differences affects the XmlSecureResolver class when you have evidence that is based on a URL (that is, when you use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%28System.String%29> method or the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A> constructor).
trans-unit.target: Ett av disse forskjeller påvirker klassen XmlSecureResolver når du har bevis som er basert på en URL-adresse (det vil si når du bruker den <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%28System.String%29>metoden eller <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A>konstruktøren).</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%28System.String%29>

trans-unit.source: The policy resolution mechanism of the SQL Server integrated CLR does not use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> or <xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone> information.
trans-unit.target: Policyen oppløsning mekanisme av SQL Server integrert CLR bruker ikke den <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url>eller <xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone>informasjon.</xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone> </xref:System.Security.Policy.Url>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it grants permissions based on the GUID that the server adds when assemblies are loaded.
trans-unit.target: I stedet gir den tillatelser som er basert på GUIDEN som serveren legger til når samlingene er lastet inn.

trans-unit.source: When you use the XmlSecureResolver in the SQL Server integrated CLR, provide any required evidence directly by using a specified <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.
trans-unit.target: Når du bruker XmlSecureResolver i SQL Server integrert CLR, angi alle nødvendige bevis direkte ved hjelp av en angitt <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: To use a secure resolver 1.
trans-unit.target: For å bruke en sikker Løsningsprogrammet 1.

trans-unit.source: Create an XmlSecureResolver with the correct permission set.
trans-unit.target: Opprett en XmlSecureResolver med riktige tillatelsene.

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> object that uses the XmlSecureResolver object.
trans-unit.target: Opprett en <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>objekt som bruker XmlSecureResolver-objektet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5a](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5a](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.cs)] 3.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #5a](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #5a](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.cs) ] 3.

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> object to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> method when you're creating the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Bestått den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>objekt i <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A>metoden når du oppretter den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5b](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5b](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.cs)] ## To restrict access by using a URL Use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29> constructor to create an XmlSecureResolver object that is allowed to access your local intranet site only.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samplesb](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samplesb](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.cs) ] ## til å begrense tilgangen ved hjelp av en URL-adresse for bruk av <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29>konstruktøren for å opprette et XmlSecureResolver-objekt som har tilgang til webområdet lokalt intranett.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.cs)] ## To restrict access by using a permission set 1.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples 3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples 3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.cs) ] ## Begrens tilgang ved hjelp av en tillatelse som er angitt 1.

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> object.
trans-unit.target: Opprett en <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>objektet.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4a](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_4.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4a](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_4.cs)] 2.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #4a](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_4.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #4a](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_4.cs) ] 2.

trans-unit.source: Specify the URLs that you want to allow access to.
trans-unit.target: Angi URL-adressene som du vil gi tilgang til.

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4b](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_5.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4b](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_5.cs)] 3.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #4b](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_5.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #4b](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_5.cs) ] 3.

trans-unit.source: Add the web permissions to the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> object.
trans-unit.target: Legg til web-tillatelser til den <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>objektet.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4c](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4c](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.cs)] 4.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples 4 c](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples 4 c](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.cs) ] 4.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29> constructor to create an XmlSecureResolver object by using the permission set.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29>konstruktøren for å opprette et objekt for XmlSecureResolver ved hjelp av tillatelsene.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4d](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4d](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.cs)] See the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A> reference page for another example.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples&4; d](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples&4; d](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.cs) ] se den <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A>referansesiden for eksempel.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To restrict access by using evidence You can restrict access by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29> constructor and specifying <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan begrense tilgang for å begrense tilgangen ved hjelp av bevis ved hjelp av <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29>konstruktøren og angi <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> </xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> is used to create the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> that is applied to the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>Brukes til å opprette <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>som skal brukes på den underliggende <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>

trans-unit.source: The XmlSecureResolver calls <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A> on the created <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> before opening any resources.
trans-unit.target: Kall XmlSecureResolver <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A>på den opprettede <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>før du åpner ressurser.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Here are some common scenarios and the type of evidence to provide for each: - If you are working in a fully trusted environment, use your assembly to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment, you have code or data coming from an outside source, and you know the origin of the outside source and have a verifiable URI, use the URI to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment and you have code or data coming from an outside source, but you don't know the origin of the outside source, either: Set the `evidence` parameter to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Her er noen vanlige situasjoner og hva slags bevis oppgi for hver: – Hvis du arbeider i et miljø med fullstendig klarerte Bruk at samlingen til å opprette bevis: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples Nr.&1;](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples Nr.&1;](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.cs) ] -Hvis du arbeider i et miljø med bare klarerte, du har koden eller data som kommer fra en ekstern kilde, og du kjenner origo for den eksterne datakilden, og har en bekreftes URI , Bruk URIEN til å opprette bevis: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples&2;](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples&2;](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.cs) ] – Hvis du arbeider i en delvis klarert miljø og du har koden eller data som kommer fra en ekstern kilde, men du ikke vet origo for den eksterne datakilden enten: Angi den `evidence` parameter `null`.

trans-unit.source: This allows no access to resources.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at ingen tilgang til ressurser.

trans-unit.source: -or- If your application requires some access to resources, request evidence from the caller.
trans-unit.target: - eller - hvis programmet krever noen tilgang til ressurser, ber du om bevis fra oppkalleren.

trans-unit.source: To use the secure resolver to load an XSLT style sheet 1.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av sikre løseren til å laste inn XSLT-stilarket 1.

trans-unit.source: Create an XmlSecureResolver with the correct permission set.
trans-unit.target: Opprett en XmlSecureResolver med riktige tillatelsene.

trans-unit.source: Pass the XmlSecureResolver to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Sende XmlSecureResolver til den <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#6](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#6](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.cs)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples&6;](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples&6; ](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.cs)]

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> klasse med den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> og <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> angitt.

trans-unit.source: The XML resolver that is wrapped by the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: XML-løseren som brytes av den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The permission set to apply to the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Tillatelsen som er satt til gjelder for den underliggende <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> calls the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the permission set before calling the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*> method on the underlying XML resolver.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> kall av <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> -metoden på tillatelsen angi før du kaller den <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>-metoden på det underliggende XML-Løsningsprogrammet.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Evidence"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> klasse med den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> og <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Evidence"> </xref> angitt.

trans-unit.source: Here are some possible scenarios and the type of evidence to provide for each scenario: - If you are working in a fully trusted environment, use your assembly to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment, you have code or data coming from an outside source, and you know the origin of the outside source and have a verifiable URI, use the URI to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment and you have code or data coming from an outside source, but you don't know the origin of the outside source, either: Set the `evidence` parameter to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Her er noen mulige scenarier og hva slags bevis oppgi for hvert scenario: – Hvis du arbeider i et miljø med fullstendig klarerte Bruk at samlingen til å opprette bevis: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples Nr.&1;](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples Nr.&1;](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.cs) ] -Hvis du arbeider i et miljø med bare klarerte, du har koden eller data som kommer fra en ekstern kilde, og du kjenner origo for den eksterne datakilden, og har en bekreftes URI , Bruk URIEN til å opprette bevis: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples&2;](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples&2;](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.cs) ] – Hvis du arbeider i en delvis klarert miljø og du har koden eller data som kommer fra en ekstern kilde, men du ikke vet origo for den eksterne datakilden enten: Angi den `evidence` parameter `null`.

trans-unit.source: This allows no access to resources.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at ingen tilgang til ressurser.

trans-unit.source: -or- If your application requires some access to resources, request evidence from the caller.
trans-unit.target: - eller - hvis programmet krever noen tilgang til ressurser, ber du om bevis fra oppkalleren.

trans-unit.source: The XML resolver that is wrapped by the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: XML-løseren som brytes av den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The evidence used to create the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> that will be applied to the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bevis brukes til å opprette den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> som vil bli brukt på den underliggende <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> calls the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the created <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> before calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> kall av <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> -metoden på den opprettede <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> før du kaller <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>på den underliggende <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> and URL provided.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> klasse med den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> og URL-adressen.

trans-unit.source: The XML resolver that is wrapped by the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: XML-løseren som brytes av den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The URL used to create the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> that will be applied to the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen brukes til å opprette den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> som vil bli brukt på den underliggende <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> calls <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> on the created <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> before calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> kall <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> på den opprettede <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> før du kaller <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>på den underliggende <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>

trans-unit.source: Creates evidence using the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter bevis med den angitte URL-adressen.

trans-unit.source: The URL used to create the evidence.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen som brukes til å opprette bevis.

trans-unit.source: The evidence generated from the supplied URL as defined by the default policy.
trans-unit.target: Bevis generert fra den angitte URL-adressen som er definert av standardpolicyen.

trans-unit.source: Sets credentials used to authenticate web requests.
trans-unit.target: Angir brukerlegitimasjonen som skal brukes til å godkjenne webforespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The credentials to be used to authenticate web requests.
trans-unit.target: Legitimasjonen som skal brukes til å godkjenne webforespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> sets the given credentials on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> angir den angitte legitimasjonen for den underliggende <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the value defaults to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; that is, the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> has no user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen ikke er angitt, bruker du verdien på <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>; som er den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> har ingen brukerlegitimasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Maps a URI to an object that contains the actual resource.
trans-unit.target: Tilordner en URI-adresse til et objekt som inneholder den faktiske ressursen.

trans-unit.source: This method temporarily sets the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> created in the constructor by calling <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> before calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> to open the resource.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden midlertidig angir den <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> opprettet i konstruktøren ved å kalle <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> før du kaller <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""> </xref> på den underliggende <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> å åpne ressursen.

trans-unit.source: The URI that is returned from <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.
trans-unit.target: URIEN som er returnert fra <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>

trans-unit.source: Currently not used.
trans-unit.target: For øyeblikket brukt ikke.

trans-unit.source: The type of object to return.
trans-unit.target: Objekttypen som skal returneres.

trans-unit.source: The current version only returns <xref:System.IO.Stream> objects.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende versjonen returnerer bare <xref:System.IO.Stream>objekter.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The stream returned by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten som returneres av kaller <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""> </xref> på den underliggende <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If a type other than <xref:System.IO.Stream> is specified, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en type enn <xref:System.IO.Stream>er angitt, returneres <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: ofObjectToReturn is neither nor a type.
trans-unit.target: ofObjectToReturnverken eller en type.

trans-unit.source: The specified URI is not an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte URIEN er ikke en absolutt URI.

trans-unit.source: absoluteUri is .
trans-unit.target: absoluteUriis .

trans-unit.source: There is a runtime error (for example, an interrupted server connection).
trans-unit.target: Det er en kjøretidsfeil (for eksempel en avbrutt servertilkobling).

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously maps a URI to an object that contains the actual resource.
trans-unit.target: Asynkront tilordner en URI-adresse til et objekt som inneholder den faktiske ressursen.

trans-unit.source: The URI returned from <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.
trans-unit.target: URIEN som er returnert fra <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>

trans-unit.source: Currently not used.
trans-unit.target: For øyeblikket brukt ikke.

trans-unit.source: The type of object to return.
trans-unit.target: Objekttypen som skal returneres.

trans-unit.source: The current version only returns <xref:System.IO.Stream> objects.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende versjonen returnerer bare <xref:System.IO.Stream>objekter.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The stream returned by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten som returneres av kaller <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""> </xref> på den underliggende <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If a type other than <xref:System.IO.Stream> is specified, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en type enn <xref:System.IO.Stream>er angitt, returneres <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Resolves the absolute URI from the base and relative URIs by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Løser den absolutte URIEN fra basistypen og den relative URIer ved å kalle <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""> </xref> på den underliggende <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The base URI used to resolve the relative URI.
trans-unit.target: Basis-URIEN er brukt til å løse den relative URIEN.

trans-unit.source: The URI to resolve.
trans-unit.target: URIEN ikke løse.

trans-unit.source: The URI can be absolute or relative.
trans-unit.target: URIEN kan være en absolutt eller relativ.

trans-unit.source: If absolute, this value effectively replaces the `baseUri` value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis absolutt denne effektivt erstatter det `baseUri` verdi.

trans-unit.source: If relative, it combines with the `baseUri` to make an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: Hvis relative, den kombinerer med den `baseUri` foreta en absolutt URI.

trans-unit.source: The absolute URI or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the relative URI cannot be resolved (returned by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>).
trans-unit.target: Den absolutte URIEN eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hvis den relative URIEN kan ikke løse (returnerte ved å kalle <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""> </xref> på den underliggende <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>).

trans-unit.source: relativeUri is .
trans-unit.target: relativeUriis .
